#summary Plan for SVC_DELAY

= Requirements =
*DELAY LIST* (list of all processes that make the system call SVC_DELAY)

{{{
DLYLIST:  .space    80
}}}

|| *P#1* || *P#2* || *P#3* || *P#4* || *P#5* || *P#6* || *P#7* || *P#8* || *P#9* || *P#10* ||
||D_TCB||...|| || || || || || || || ||
||D_TOUT||...|| || || || || || || || ||


*DLYLIST* ... pointer to DELAY LIST


Structure of DELAY LIST:
  * *D_TCB* ... pointer to TCB of process
  * *D_TOUT* ... timeout/delay for process

{{{
.equ  D_TCB,    0
.equ  D_TOUT,   D_TCB+4
}}}


Error code:
{{{
.equ E_OVRFLV, -5      /* overflow in DELAY LIST */
}}}
